newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Czech CNB fixes crown +0.80 pct vs mark/usd basket.
newsitem.headline: Czech CNB fixes crown +0.80 pct vs mark/usd basket.

text.p: The Czech National Bank (CNB) fixed the crown at 29.790 to the dollar after Thursday's fixing at 29.621, and at 17.315 to the mark from 17.262.
The above rates imply a deviation from the midpoint of the central bank's mark/dollar basket of +0.80 percent, after a deviation of +1.20 on Thursday.
At the time the central bank calculated today's fixing, the crown was trading on the interbank market at +0.76.
The crown fixing is announced daily at about 1140 CET (1040 GMT), and is within plus/minus 7.5 percent of the mark/dollar basket midpoint calculated at 1130 CET.
